definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: man (NH id., MI:16 [[גברן]] (pl.), Aram. [[גְּבַר]], gbar; As. gabru, rival is Akk. Loan-word acc. to Schr:JLZ 1874, 200 Dl:S 120, Sm. Chald. Ge 286)—De 22:5 + 39 t.; [[גׇּ֑בֶר]] Job 3:3 + 13 t.; cstr. [[גְּבַּר]] Ps 18:26 (= 2Sa 22:26 [[גִּבּוֹר]] but LXX SyrVer rd. [[גֶּבֶר]]); pl. [[גְּבָרים]] Je 41:16 + 10 t.;—man as strong, disting. fr. women, children, and non-combatants whom he is to defend, chiefly poetic Ex 10:11, Nu 24:3, Nu 24:15 (E) Ex 12:37, Jos 7:14, Jos 7:17, Jos 7:18 (J) De 22:5, De 22:5, Ju Jdg 5:30, 2Sa 23:1, 1Ch 23:3, 1Ch 24:4, 1Ch 26:12, Job 3:3 + 14 t. Jb; Ps 18:26 + 8 t. Psalm; Pr 6:34 + 7 t. Pr; Is 22:17, Je 17:5 + 8 t. Je; La 3:1, La 3:27, La 3:35, La 3:39, Da 8:15, Mic 2:2, Hb Hab 2:5, Zec 13:7; also 1Sa 10:21 LXX We Dr; = each (of locusts) Joe 2:8, cf. [[אישׁ]].
